snippet.title: Lake - Official Season’s Greetings DLC Reveal Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description: The Season’s Greetings DLC for Lake will be available this holiday season. Check out the reveal trailer for the upcoming Season’s Greetings DLC prequel to Lake, where you take on the role of sixty-something mailman Thomas Weiss, Meredith’s father, during Christmas time in 1985, and get ready to return to Providence Oaks.
